# Question

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example

```julia Function wrap\_string(text::String; text\_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(text, r"\s+")
    result = String[]
    line = String()

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) + 1 > text\_width
            push!(result, line)
            line = String(word)
        else
            line *= word * " "
        end
    end

    push!(result, line)

    join(result, "\n")
end

# Example usage
wrap\_string("The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.\nSplits words at whitespace.\nMaximum width is 10 characters.")
```

Output:
```
"The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.\nSplits words at whitespace.\nMaximum width is 10 characters."

"The quick brown fox jumps over the\nlazy dog.\nSplits words at whitespace.\nMaximum width is 10 characters."
```
